WorkItem.Description:
Hi all,

just noticed a minor issue which isn't directly related to the Power Doc solution.  
If you're using Windows 10 and PS Version 5 you'll get a Null reference exception if you have the module RDS-Manager in your modules folder.

See here as well: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/37972365/powershell-5-0-windows-10-get-command-null-reference-exception/40406361#40406361

Workaround by now is to remove the RDS Manager module

Regards
Dirk
WorkItem.Summary: module RDS-Manager causes issue Win10 PS 5
